mapper.select: SELECT * FROM blog WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM blog WHERE status = 1 AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blog WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog (title, content, summary, cover_image, user_id, category_id, view_count, like_count, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{coverImage}, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND like_count > 0
